title: sundarAnga kAnta
sahitya:
sundarAnga kAnta kOpaminni tengalu citamO


anupallavi

  manda bhAgya yAyorende pApa karma mUlamO


caraNam 1    pancashayakastra mETTu hanta vAdi jnyAnalani kinca manasam mEha pankajAkSa cancalam
    caraNam 2    shARikapikAbhi rAma kAntha manjuLEritam cArugIta mendashani tulya minna nAratam
    caraNam 3    cadamenniyE pramOdayAshu mOda dAyaka padmanAbha viravil varika dEva jIva nAyaka
